metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2978 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
query.c in NSD 3.0.x through 3.0.8, 3.1.x through 3.1.1, and 3.2.x before 3.2.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and child process crash) via a crafted DNS packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nsd - 4.0.0-5
nsd3 - 4.0.0-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nsd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0-5').
